appname.label: App name
appname.description: Used to display the app on the dashboard.

externalAddress.label: External address
externalAddress.description: URL that will be opened when clicking on the app.

isOpeningNewTab.label: Open in new tab
isOpeningNewTab.description: Open the app in a new tab instead of the current one.

statusChecker.label: Status checker
statusChecker.description: Checks if your app is online using a simple HTTP(S) request.

statusCodes.label: HTTP status codes
statusCodes.description: The HTTP status codes that are considered as online.

icon.label: App Icon
icon.description: The icon that will be displayed on the dashboard.

type.label: Integration configuration
type.description: The integration configuration that will be used to connect to your app.
